lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic vanquished Andy Murray for the fourth time in an Australian Open final on Sunday to win a record-equalling sixth title and serve notice to his rivals that he could surpass even his stellar 2015 this year.
snippet: Novak Djokovic vanquished Andy Murray for the fourth time in an Australian Open final on Sunday to win a record-equalling sixth title and serve notice to his rivals that he could surpass even his stellar 2015 this year....

headline.main: Djokovic Domination Total as He Wins Sixth Melbourne Title
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Domination Total as He Wins Sixth Melbourne Title
